description: This file sets up an AI agent with a PDF knowledge base and a Groq model, then queries it for a recipe.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An AI agent that interacts with a knowledge base and a language model.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that loads content from PDF URLs.

classes.name: Groq
classes.description: A language model class representing the Groq model.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A vector database interface using PostgreSQL with pgvector.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the PDF knowledge base, optionally recreating the index.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Prints the response from the agent to a given prompt.
